divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming home from the Dmacc campus in Ankeny and i was almost in the Altoona city limits when all of a sudden a bright white flashing light came from out of nowhere at first it was traveling north but then it switched directions and began heading south but then it started pulsing red and the white flashing light was gone there was just red glowing lights then the object again switched directions and started heading west and it was descending as it was flying west but it didn't have any similar lights to planes flying around the area i have never seen lights on a plane like the ones this object had plus it switched directions too many times it was hard to tell the shape but this object looked strange it was in sight for about five minutes i think ufo sightings are on the rise in my area because just two weeks ago a huge craft flew over Altoona which i did report to this site i wonder if anyone else in town is seeing these strange craft
Summary: Another strange pulsing object i've seen before is back but with different features
